context: A recent security incident indicated an attempt to tamper with Microsoft Defender Antivirus, detected on 2024-07-04. This activity might suggest an attempt to evade detection. The process `powershell.exe` was seen executing the script `get-krbticket.ps1`. Note: Tampering techniques are typically used by attackers to disable or interfere with security tools and processes.
question: Related to this incident, there was a sign-in attempt with a deceptive user account. Can you identify the name of the user account used in this suspicious sign-in attempt?
solution_steps: An attempt was detected to disable the Microsoft Defender Antivirus service by the account `tgs2z`.
A sign-in attempt was detected using a deceptive user account `kyleg` that might be used by an attacker to perform various attack activities, including lateral movement and accessing sensitive data.
